long_description: The trail-worthy Marmot Carson pants have a casual look to keep you in style on your weekend adventures into the hills. Abrasion-resistant nylon canvas fabric is made using hollow-core yarns for long-lasting durability without a lot of weight. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Fabric dries quickly to keep you comfortable when you're on the go. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Hems are reinforced to stand up wear and tear. Front slash pockets and 2 rear pockets hold your essentials. The Marmot Carson pants have a relaxed fit.
short_description: The trail-worthy Marmot Carson pants have a casual look to keep you in style on your weekend adventures into the hills.
